DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess bone mineral density in patients switching from an oral bisphosphonate to zoledronic acid, compared to those staying on the oral bisphosphonate.
DOC.brief_title: Switching Osteoporosis Patients Currently on Oral Bisphosphonate to Zoledronic Acid
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women between 45 and 79 years of age Must be osteopenic/osteoporotic Treatment with oral bisphosphonate for at least 1 year Any woman of child bearing potential Treatment with other bone active agents Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
